rows.name: text_top_1
rows.value: One person gives the other person a target number and challenges them to come up with different ways of adding and/or subtracting to get that number. If the target is 3, it might start with 1 + 2, but then become 1 + 5 - 3 and so on. As your child learns more mathematics, additional skills can be added, such as doubling and halving. For example, 5 is 2 doubled plus 1 or two 10’s minus three 5’s.
